PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2011-05242011-03-25,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  PS
ActFirearms Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Firearms Licences Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the FIREARMS LICENCES REGULATIONS, which extends the Possession Only Licence eligibility measure (for an additional two-year period until May 16, 2013), thereby removing the requirement for previous holders of these licences to take the firearms safety training course and obtain a Possession and Acquisition Licence. These amendments, along with the Firearms Fees Regulations and the Order Declaring an Amnesty Period (2006), encourage previously lawful firearms owners to bring themselves back into compliance with federal firearms legislation.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2011-0103 Publication Date: 2011-04-13
AttachmentsAttachment
